column1: Funeral services will be conducted for Zulmae Bourque Coudroy
column6: at 2:00 PM at Nativity of Our Lady Catholic Church with Father Ed Degeyter officiating. Burial will follow in Nativity of Our Lady Mausoleum.   Visitation will be on Monday
column10: from 9:00 AM until 1:30 PM and a rosary will be prayed in the funeral home at 11:00 AM.
